resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
liyafan82 opened a new pull request #12296:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12296


   When a malformed Arrow file containing an extremely large footer size (much larger than the file size) is fed to the ArrowFileReader, our implementation fails detect the problem, due to integer arithmetic overflow.
   
   This will lead to extremely large memory allocation and eventually causing an OutOfMemoryError.
   


--

emkornfield commented on a change in pull request #12296:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12296#discussion_r800131518



##########
File path: java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/ipc/ArrowMagic.java
##########
@@ -27,9 +27,9 @@
 class ArrowMagic {
   private ArrowMagic(){}
 
-  private static final byte[] MAGIC = "ARROW1".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+  static final byte[] MAGIC = "ARROW1".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
 
-  public static final int MAGIC_LENGTH = MAGIC.length;
+  static final int MAGIC_LENGTH = MAGIC.length;

Review comment:
       why make this package private?  This seems like an unnecessary API breakage?




-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.

   LGTM, just one question about the API change.  Did this come from the fuzzer?  Have you opened up a seperate PR to add the fuzzing file to our corpus to prevent regressions?


--

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
When a malformed Arrow file containing an extremely large footer size (much larger than the file size) is fed to the ArrowFileReader, our implementation fails detect the problem, due to integer arithmetic overflow.

This will lead to extremely large memory allocation and eventually causing an OutOfMemoryError.
fields.summary: [Java] Detect exceptional footer size in Arrow file reader
